visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a column chart comparing estimated corn and wheat production in some countries. The chart should have a title 'Corn vs wheat estimated production for 2023', with styled axes and labels. The data series should include the names 'Corn' and 'Wheat' with their respective production data. The chart should also have custom colors and additional configurations such as chart margins, background, and legend.

title.text: Corn vs wheat estimated production for 2023

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a column chart that compares the estimated corn and wheat production across several countries. The chart includes a title and subtitle with specific styling for font size and color. The x-axis represents the countries with styled labels and a title, while the y-axis represents the production in 1000 metric tons, also with styled labels and a title. The tooltip displays the production value with a suffix indicating the unit. The plot options for the column chart include settings for point padding and border width. The data series for 'Corn' and 'Wheat' are provided with specific colors. Additional configurations include enabling the legend with specific styling and positioning, disabling credits, and enabling exporting options for the chart.
